description.title: Letterboxd 500 most watched movies of all time
subtitle: As of: November 23rd, 2025
Seen: 56%.
Hope you all enjoy and let me know if a movie is missing :)
* Barbie is #1 with 6,22M views
* Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides is #500 with 1,231M views
Monthly changes:
* Perfect Blue (#480), One Battle After Another (#495) and The Fast and the Furious (#498) are new on this list. Civil War, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs and Society of the Snow are out

* Weapons (+67), The Black Phone (+45), KPop Demon Hunters (+45), The Fantastic Four: First Steps (+32), F1 (+21) and Perfect Blue (+19) gained the most spots. Booksmart (-14), Elvis (-13), The French Dispatch (-11), Gravity (-10) and Room (-10) lost the most
Movies that are close to an entrance:
* Dirty Dancing (1,224M views)
* The Florida Project (1,223M views)
* Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1,222M views)
* Enola Holmes (1,222M views)
* Civil War (1,221M views)
Trending movies that will sooner or later be in this list:
* Scary Movie (1,211M views)
* Grown Ups (1,202M views)
* Materialists (1,107M views)
* Bugonia (528K views)
* Wicked: For Good (322K views)
